definition: acceptable/passable/justifiable/(of a course of action) to make sense
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

to go/to go to (a place)/(of a time etc) last/just passed/to send/to remove/to get rid of/to reduce/to be apart from in space or time/to die (euphemism)/to play (a part)/(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth/(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)/(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)

sentences.english: I don't think there will ever be any problem about canonizing you.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲，倘若把你封爲使徒也說得過去。

sentences.english: Reviewing what actually took place this weekend, none of these explanations wears very well, except as indicators of their expositors’ ideological blinders.
sentences.chinese: 回顧週末發生的事情，這些解釋沒有一個很說得過去。

sentences.english: He gave some reasons, only a few of which were valid.
sentences.chinese: 他給了一些理由，只有幾個說得過去。

sentences.english: I mean, I'd understand it if they were shagging .
sentences.chinese: 我意思是，要是他們搞在一起了還說得過去。

sentences.english: Calling 2017 the Year of the Chicken would also work.
sentences.chinese: 同理，說雞年的“雞”是母雞也說得過去。
她的英語發音還說得過去。
